content: On the other side, you’ll encounter a very strong Swift Bat. These enemies can dash at you very fast with their powerful swings to hit hard, or hit you from a distance with waves of force. This one in particular is stronger than the rest because after defeating it, you’ll gain the Swift Bat Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley of Despair' and the sub-subsection 'The Loong’s Secret Tomb'.
The content is as follows:
On the other side, you’ll encounter a very strong Swift Bat. These enemies can dash at you very fast with their powerful swings to hit hard, or hit you from a distance with waves of force. This one in particular is stronger than the rest because after defeating it, you’ll gain the Swift Bat Spirit.
